utils.load_block_to_list¶

utils.load_block_to_list(path_to_block: ~pathlib.Path | str, data_type=<class 'numpy.float32'>, divider=-133) → List[ndarray]¶

Loads a single block into a list of traces (used for older measurements, stored in binary files using .dat extension)

Parameters:
path_to_blockPath or str

the path to the file containing the block

data_typeOptional, type of the data, default: np.float32
dividerint

number used to distinguish individual trace data

Returns:
resList[np.ndarray]

MCBJ STM-BJ
